hero: Simple and performant reactivity for building user interfaces.
info: Solid is a purely reactive library. It was designed from the ground up with a reactive core. It's influenced by reactive principles developed by previous libraries.

strengths.label: Performant
strengths.description: Consistently tops recognized UI speed and memory utilization benchmarks.

strengths.label: Powerful
strengths.description: Composable reactive primitives married with the flexibility of JSX.

strengths.label: Pragmatic
strengths.description: A sensible and tailored API makes developing fun and simple.

strengths.label: Productive
strengths.description: Ergonomics and familiarity make building simple or complex things a breeze.

example.headline: It's familiar and modern
copy: Solid stands on the shoulders of giants, particularly React and Knockout. If you've developed with React Hooks before, Solid should seem very natural. In fact, more natural as Solid's model is much simpler with no Hook rules. Every Component executes once and it is the Hooks and bindings that execute many times as their dependencies update.

Solid follows the same philosophy as React with unidirectional data flow, read/write segregation, and immutable interfaces. It however has a completely different implementation that forgoes using a Virtual DOM.

reactivity.headline: Fine-grained reactivity means you do more with less.
reactivity.subheadline: Solid is built with efficient reactive primitives from your userland code to your JSX views.
reactivity.copy: This unlocks complete control over what gets updated and when, even at the DOM binding level. With no Virtual DOM or extensive diffing the framework never does more work than you want it to.

headline: Performance focused
on both client and server
performance.copy: The strength of fine-grained reactivity as an approach shines on all notable benchmarks. Even if performance is not your focus, it's virtually effortless and without the cost of complicated/involved DX. Think of Solid's performance gain as a free win. Solid is about being fast without trying.

features.headline: Fully loaded with all features.
features.copy: Solid supports all common and expected library features and expands on aspects to increase DX.

benchmarks.link_label: The JS Framework Benchmark compares browser performance across a wide range of tests. Lower is better.

js_benchmark.title: JS Framework Benchmark
js_benchmark.description: The JS Framework Benchmark compares browser performance across a wide range of tests. Lower is better.

isomorophic_benchmark.title: Isomorphic UI Benchmarks (Search Results)
isomorophic_benchmark.description: This benchmark tests raw Server Rendering speeds. Higher is better.
